title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 406.16 - Communications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 406.16 - Communications

State Regulations

It is requested that licensees direct their Banking

Department correspondence, reports, notices, statements and applications to the

Licensed Financial Services Division of the Banking Department at the address
set forth in section
1.1
of Supervisory Policy G 1 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
406.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
